languages.text: "День, когда ведьма отправляется в небытие, должен отмечаться как праздник".
"The day a witch is sent into oblivion should be celebrated as a holiday."
languages.original_text: "День, когда ведьма отправляется в небытие, должен отмечаться как праздник".

traits.locale_text: "The day a witch is sent into oblivion should be celebrated as a holiday."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “这个女巫被处决的这天，我们应该当成节日庆祝一番。”
languages.original_text: "The day a witch is sent into oblivion should be celebrated as a holiday."

traits.locale_text: “这个女巫被处决的这天，我们应该当成节日庆祝一番。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Chaque jour qui voit une sorcière périr devrait être déclaré jour férié. »
languages.original_text: "The day a witch is sent into oblivion should be celebrated as a holiday."

traits.locale_text: « Chaque jour qui voit une sorcière périr devrait être déclaré jour férié. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Cualquier día en el que una bruja muere debería celebrarse».
languages.original_text: "The day a witch is sent into oblivion should be celebrated as a holiday."

traits.locale_text: «Cualquier día en el que una bruja muere debería celebrarse».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「魔女が忘却される日を、祝日として記念すべきだ」
languages.original_text: "The day a witch is sent into oblivion should be celebrated as a holiday."

traits.locale_text: 「魔女が忘却される日を、祝日として記念すべきだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Der Tag, an dem eine Hexe ins ewige Nichts geschickt wird, sollte ein Feiertag sein."
languages.original_text: "The day a witch is sent into oblivion should be celebrated as a holiday."

traits.locale_text: "Der Tag, an dem eine Hexe ins ewige Nichts geschickt wird, sollte ein Feiertag sein."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "The day a witch is sent into oblivion should be celebrated as a holiday."

languages.text: "Cadının nisyana yollandığı gün, bayram olarak kutlanmalı."
